com.collective.celos

Class WorkflowConfigurationParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.collective.celos.WorkflowConfigurationParser

  • public class WorkflowConfigurationParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads a set of JS files from a directory and creates a WorkflowConfiguration. The JS engine has one variable defined, celosWorkflowConfigurationParser, which points to the parser instance. The helper script celos-scripts.js defines the utility function addWorkflow(object), which stringifies the input JS object, and passes the string to the parser's addWorkflowFromJSONString method.
